text: Ezɨ Farisiba dɨkavigha God ko mɨgeir dɨpenim ategha uari akuvagha Iesus mɨsoghasa tuaviba buri.(12:14) Farisiba ghaze, arɨmariaba agevir arazim uaghan ingangarir mam, egha Sabatɨn arazir kaba uaghan dar anogoroke. Ezɨ Farisiba gari, Iesus Sabatɨn arɨmariaba agevi, kamaghɨn me a baseme, egha a mɨsueghasa tuaviba buri. Luk 13:14 ko Jon 5:16-18ɨn gan.
